channel.title: MP5 Glitch
channel.description:
Hey guys, I've noticed this several times during my playthrough. The MP5 fires single shots during certain clips, yet as soon as you reload, it returns to burst-fire mode. It happens completely randomly, but is quite frequent. Below is an example:
[url='https://dl.dropbox.com/u/16065019/Videos/MP5%20Glitch.mp4'][b][u][COLOR='Lime']MP5 - Single Shot Glitch[/SIZE][/u][/b][/url]
I used no custom scripts or edits. :slight_smile:

lwf:

I had this happen too but could not reproduce it.

Heh, I reproduced it in a matter of seconds. It happened again (it had already happened a LOT of times during my playthrough) and then I thought, “damn, I should record and report this” so I alt-tabbed, opened Fraps and recorded for a little while.

2 magazine-reloads later and it was on single-shot mode.
